import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tokyo', templateUrl: './tokyo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tokyo.component.css'] }) export class TokyoComponent { }

Tokyo

About Tokyo

Tokyo, formerly (until 1868) Edo, city and capital of Tokyo to (metropolis) and of Japan. It is located at the head of Tokyo Bay on the Pacific coast of central Honshu. It is the focus of the vast metropolitan area often called Greater Tokyo, the largest urban and industrial agglomeration in Japan.

Attractions

  • Senso-ji temple
  • Tsukiji Fish Market
  • Tokyo Tower
  • Shibuya Crossing
  • Meiji Shrine

Food

Tokyo is known for its amazing food scene. Some popular dishes include sushi, ramen, and yakitori.

Culture

Tokyo is a city with a rich cultural heritage. Some of its cultural highlights include traditional festivals, sumo wrestling, and kabuki theater.
